original_text: “It must be eaten inside the house; take none of the meat outside the house. Do not break any of the bones.
korean_text: 한 집에서 먹되 그 고기를 조금도 집 밖으로 내지 말고 뼈도 꺾지 말지며

sentences.original_text: It must be eaten inside the house
take none of the meat outside the house
Do not break any of the bones
